documents.document: @Coaster101 I have a different roller coaster calendar. Mine is showing Behemoth at Canada's Wonderland.
@Australia I apologize for our rotten a🎀🎀hole of a president.
Sorority Bow 🎀🎀🎀🎀 #SillyHorrorMovieNames
The Storage Ring #SillyHorrorMovieNames #synchrotron https://t.co/wEWcFEG56v
Dead skunk #WorstRoadsideAttractions
@boilerpunk_0 I know better than to make comments like that. I grew up around obesity. I have disabilities. I am so ashamed.
Alexa, please help me understand my social ineptitude. #ThingsYouDontAskAlexa
He can't fit his phone up his a&& where his head is. #ReasonsTrumpHangsUp
@boilerpunk_0 I hate being *anything*ist! >_<
Somebody spoke with too much common sense and he had to throw up. #ReasonsTrumpHangsUp
The phone keeps slipping out of his tiny hands and the battery falls out. #ReasonsTrumpHangsUp
He has to take a twitter break to insult people #ReasonsTrumpHangsUp
@stuartsyoga @treatmyocd Now, I don't fight the thoughts anymore. They're harmless & don't indicate I'm a bad person. I'm used to them.
@stuartsyoga @treatmyocd Before, I tried to fight the intrusive thoughts with every ounce of energy I had. I even was tempted to self-harm.
@davidkelliher @JohnWomersley @SciTecDaresbury Particle accelerators are awesome, and so are you!
Why is our president such an asshole? #ThingsYouDontAskAlexa
@Manna_Festo Still dumping 2016. Get the evil in the other years at the root :)
@CLS_Rob looks like he's been standing there for two days listening to the CEO talking. https://t.co/h0Sa5AcPjS
The intrusive thoughts and anxiety lasted nearly three weeks. I remember feeling so anxious and helpless against my own mind.
but one of the worst OCD episodes of my life started the following month, with intrusive thoughts of one of the crew members.
The incident had a major effect on a couple of my mental disorders. It did start my interest in space shuttles (which I see as a good thing)
With love and bows, I tweet in tribute to those lost when #Columbia disintegrated while reentering the atmosphere. I was 12.
@AwareTourettes The only way Tourette's makes me swear: I am #%@& sick and tired of these constant %#!@& tics!!
@AwareTourettes I hate so much when people joke about Tourette's being solely an issue of compulsive swearing.
Doctor Ho #OneLetterOffTvShows
Shart Tank @midnight #OneLetterOffTvShows
For rectal use only #RejectedCandyHeartSayings
Blow me #RejectedCandyHeartSayings
Grab em by the pussy #RejectedCandyHeartSayings
That's what she said #RejectedCandyHeartSayings
F🎀🎀k You #RejectedCandyHeartSayings
@JennyRohn @psi_organa sonicate your a🎀🎀!
Madnight @midnight #OneLetterOffTvShows
Holmes on Hoes #OneLetterOffTvShows
@emitoms I'll be 27 in May. (holy f🎀🎀k)
@operagirl hey 🎀 I've beaten Pure-O OCD, and I'm here if you need to chat.
@DrTempleGrandin The new job I'll be trying out tomorrow reminds me of you! It involves washing and packaging cow shoes.
@DrAndreDavid I live right in the path of totality! 😃
THIS!!! https://t.co/COC8TX7jd9
I wonder if the global warming crisis can be mitigated by having Donald Trump shut his mouth.
I'm starting to think Donald Trump might not be allowed into Canada after his executive "Muslim ban" order https://t.co/F8r92hlAld
@EricaGlasier @Eigenmotion I must remember to do this!
I'm smart and talented 😊🎀 #ReasonsToLoveMeIn4Words https://t.co/cJHDiHsYHF
@melofcgamergirl that sounds like an excellent no ban, no wall protest chant: Build Bridges, Not Walls!
@melofcgamergirl It disgusts me to think the money I make will be used to build a structure that divides humanity. I prefer bridges.
@emitoms I wonder what kind of shenanigans would ensue if one of them was named Alexa.

When you look up asteroid impacts on youtube, expect to see things like this.
By the way, welcome to 2017. https://t.co/3HxAowN5tY
@theocdmormon @treatmyocd We live in a society where it takes bravery to dare to talk about your mental illnesses, due to all the stigma.
@theocdmormon @treatmyocd I get a lot of "you're so brave for speaking out about your struggles".
@JGibsonDem If he gets impeached and removed from office, I will be full of joy! I've been dealing with lots of anxiety & depression.
@boazhsan or for me, avoid checking trending topics.
@boazhsan I feel the exact same way. I had to leave work early cause the anxiety was so bad.
@artlifeprobs I had some struggles with this drawing. I kept drawing his feet backwards! https://t.co/stJIIIpuYZ
@artlifeprobs Wet painting falls on your face. Happened to me a few years ago. >_<
I think talking about #acceleratorphysics will help distract me.
@melofcgamergirl I'm amazed my brain is functioning well enough to tweet.
I'm having scary thoughts about current events leading to laws that would prevent me, a US citizen, from traveling abroad.
I feel like I'm racing the clock to get to Canada while I still can.
It reduces the amount of suffering in the world. #WhyWeAllShouldBeNice
@boazhsan I forgave, but I will never forget. I use my story to advocate for autistic special interests in the classroom.
@boazhsan They thought my interests distracted me from learning. Took me 11 years to forgive them.
@boazhsan One of my biggest fears is mistreatment of disabled students. When I was 11, I wasn't allowed to talk about my interests in class.
@ACLU I don't have a credit card or paypal account to donate with. >_<
If you're like the guy on the left, kindly stand still while I punch you into the year 2054. https://t.co/PAyYqxdCUr
@JohnJowett Fortunately, I am not. He is an embarrassment to this whole planet. Your country deserves better.
Open head, insert brain, close head
@orLaura40 and I rocking our @CanLightSource shirts! https://t.co/i5b0nUALg9
At least when I saw Mitt Romney stickers in 2012, I just playfully imagined egging their car. Still not good, but not as scary as last night
@ScienceMarchDC Of course, the shuttles' names start with the same letter & Columbia was lost just days after the Challenger anniversary.
@ScienceMarchDC Age 12, I remember hearing people talk about the Columbia when it was lost. I thought they were talking about Challenger.
Saw the same car again, and started making swatting motions and almost hit the window- again, without thinking. This is not normal for me.
It's almost as if our car was holding me back. I wasn't even thinking, and that's scary.
Just saw a Trump bumper sticker while riding home, & threw a big taekwondo punch w/o even thinking. The seat belt tensed up on my shoulder.
@1AndOwenly I don't limit my weirdness to just my sleeve :) it's all over me!
Party at @WashingtonSQ!! #chinesenewyear https://t.co/D2Gj8NN2hA
My heart desires the impeachment of Donald Trump as much as it desires a visit to Fermilab.
@iam_1in4 Me: *sees message, self-harms due to feeling rejected*
@JustinTrudeau @synchrofish Besides, the Pacific Northwest is overdue to get PWNED by an earthquake. >_<
@JustinTrudeau @synchrofish The @CanLightSource is calling my name and I desire a permanent position there.
@JustinTrudeau @synchrofish What if my life isn't immediately at risk, but my clueless government is freaking me out?
@OhHeyItsVykky Next #ArtfulSpoons event is on February 17.
@OhHeyItsVykky You should share some for @ArtfulSpoons. It's a monthy art sharing event open to artists with physical and mental illnesses.
@DrAndreDavid Trump is committing crimes against humanity. That and treasonous behavior should make him eligible for impeachment.
#OnceImDead I want a synchrotron radiation beamline named after me.
@Fermilab Sadly, I've not yet learned how to calculate collider luminosity. But I do know there'd be lots of synchrotron radiation!
@Fermilab I ran some numbers on this Globatron, using the Large Hadron Collider as a basis of comparison: https://t.co/zYpb707GxQ
This is the most beautiful slime I've ever seen. https://t.co/Rgn2T7tK8C
A proton beam from the Large Hadron Collider #ThingsYouShouldntLick

High voltage wire #ThingsYouShouldntLick
This will be fun... 😏 #ThingsYouShouldntLick
@Fermilab @chrisquigg which experiment is this screenshot from?
Tevatron would've had to be twice the size it actually was if normal conducting magnets were used.
This was necessary, since higher energy beams require stronger magnetic fields to manipulate them.
